title: Ex plat adc lf support :)
body: Was Plat on a few different accounts, have not played for about 18months now. Getting back into the game, lf a support idc for elo. If you're positive and willing to work with me im positive we can climb. Ill start on account around silver/gold mmr. Add me :) Justanx

replies.body: Added you to game, keen on games later.
add me in game ill play with ya. birdious is very suspect and i hear he has a bad attitude
